sentences.en: Besides , rapid progress was made in the divestiture of radio paging assets from the P & T sectors and the restructuring on a nationwide basis.
sentences.cn: 全国邮电无线寻呼资产剥离、改制重组工作取得了较大进展.

sentences.en: Finally it made research that AHP applied in the course of divestiture.
sentences.cn: 最后还对层次分析法在资产剥离中的应用研究.

sentences.en: The divestiture of non - performing assets for the company to build a healthy balance sheet.
sentences.cn: 不良资产的剥离为公司构建了一张健康的资产负债表.

sentences.en: The divestiture takes place two years later on January 1, 1984.
sentences.cn: 这项法令于2年后的1984年1月1日执行.

sentences.en: The methods of corporationcontraction include divestiture offequity carve - out , stock repurchase, targeted stock, voluntary liquidations, etc.
sentences.cn: 公司紧缩技术包括资产剥离、公司分立、分拆上市 、 股份回购 、 定向股和自愿清算等.

sentences.en: UNIX - based minicomputer, manufactured by AT & T and widely deployed by the Bell Operating Companies prior to divestiture.
sentences.cn: 一种基于UNIX的微型计算机, AT & T生产,贝尔各运营公司在解体前广泛采用.

sentences.en: We can found out the minute difference of divestiture from this chapter.
sentences.cn: 这章可以看出资产剥离在国内外的微小差别.

sentences.en: What do this all covered with ice and snow two beautiful woman divestiture do?
sentences.cn: 这两位美女冰天雪地的脱衣干啥?

trans.tran_cn: 脱去（衣服），剥夺财产或权利，夺去称号，脱衣
